name: Bubble shooter (itch) (amm)
description:
one of the most played games in the world. Pop all the bubbles by making combinations of 3 or more.

test your color matching skills. Bubble Shooter Classic is a mix between a puzzle game and a classic arcade game. You have to shoot bubbles from the playing area by matching several bubbles of the same color. You will have a filled area at the top mixed with bubbles of different colors. You have to make them disappear to win the level.

To eliminate the bubbles, you need to match three or more bubbles of the same color together. To do this, send your bubble to the bubbles of the same color. Try to remove all the bubbles with it as fast as possible. Have fun with this android game.

The more you play Bubble Shooter, the more the difficulty increases. Each level gets harder and you have to think more before you shoot. Make sure your timing is ideal and look for color combinations faster.
